item.title: Mum left angry, frustrated after 3 teen children booted off overloaded flight
item.description:
Three children were taken off an overloaded flight bound for Brisbane and left sitting in the air bridge without any idea of what was going on - or their parents being contacted first.
The children ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202028/airnz_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The first Brisbane based Atareta Wilson knew her upset children weren't coming home was when her oldest rung her from the tarmac.

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202028/atareta_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Brisbane-based Kiwi Atareta Wilson says Air New Zealand needs to communicate better with passengers and their families when they make sudden changes to their flights. Photo / Supplied

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202028/SCCZEN_232330972_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Former Waikato woman Atareta Wilson, now living in Brisbane, was furious with Air NZ after her three children were pulled off their flight back to Australia on Saturday. Photo / File

item.title: Auckland's drought crisis costed at $224m for extra water
item.description:
The cost of easing Auckland's drought crisis has risen to an eye-watering $224 million.
The money will be spent over the next 12 months on bringing back old water supplies, upgrading others and taking ...
